none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 01, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
Burly and raw Midwest straight edge from the early '90s, there are only three songs on this tape but CROSSCURRENT dish out pure perfection. The metal that eventually corrupted so much 'core in the '90s is certainly present here, but in it's primitive state the influence just kicks the hardcore in its ass. Vocals are flawless for the style and the politics are as evident as the power, even on such a short tape. CROSSCURRENT I'm straight and clean and I'm proud of myself
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-1viMcfxnRq8/UkokH2ZQPKI/AAAAAAAAIug/YITx2LkYmkE/s1600/crosscurrent+front+copy.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-CjhX6klFaaM/UkomZtlUibI/AAAAAAAAIus/28QnnqG0a7c/s1600/crosscurrent+img.jpg

seo.title: Crosscurrent - Crosscurrent demo 1992 - Terminal Escape
